SEARCH
Package HwSystem.Devices

Class Device

java.lang.Object
HwSystem.Devices.Device
Direct Known Subclasses:
Display, MotorDriver, Sensor, WirelessIO
public abstract class Device extends Object
Abstract base class for all hardware devices in the system. Provides common functionality for device state management and protocol handling. All specific device types must extend this class and implement the abstract methods.

      Turns off the device. Implementation depends on the specific device type.

      public Device.DeviceState getState()
      Gets the current state of the device.
      Returns:
      The current device state (ON or OFF)

    • getProtocol

      public String getProtocol()
      Gets the name of the protocol currently used by this device.
      Returns:
      The protocol name as a string, or null if no protocol is set

    • setProtocol

      public void setProtocol(String protocolName)
      Sets the communication protocol for this device. Creates an appropriate protocol object based on the provided protocol name.
      Parameters:
      protocolName - The name of the protocol to use ("UART", "SPI", "I2C", or "OneWire")

    • setState

      public void setState(Device.DeviceState dState)
      Sets the state of the device.
      Parameters:
      dState - The new state to set for the device
